title: Redwoodian: Wilfair Book 2
description: A late-blooming hotel heiress visits her family's mountain lodge with her cute, motel-running neighbors. Their mission? Search out answers to a metaphysical mystery. A strange building follows them, there's some romantic bickering, a snowstorm, and a cozy camp-out. Most importantly, the young hotelier takes a stand on a life-changing issue.
author: Alysia Gray Painter
